paper_abstract: We extend our recent work on set-theoretic solutions of the Yang-Baxter or braid relations with new results about their automorphism groups, strong twisted unions of solutions and multipermutation solutions. We introduce and study graphs of solutions and use our graphical methods for the computation of solutions of finite order and their automorphisms. Results include a detailed study of solutions of multipermutation level 2. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Set-theoretic solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation, graphs and computations
